sourcesContent:
export const WalletInfo = ({ balance, selectedWallet, onDisconnect }) => { return (

Wallet

{selectedWallet && ( )}
{selectedWallet ? ( <>
Name:

{selectedWallet.name}

Available:

{balance?.free ? parseFloat(balance.free).toFixed(2) : '0.10'} USDT

Total:

{balance ? (parseFloat(balance.free) + parseFloat(balance.locked)).toFixed(2) : '0.00'} USDT

) : (

No wallet selected

)}
); };
